title: Fast shuffle BSON generator for Keras
description: This notebook showcases a fast way to read data from BSON into a generator for Keras. The idea is strongly inspired from https://www.kaggle.com/humananalog/keras-generator-for-reading-directly-from-bson Since I don't have a SSD, the original Generator is ~3s per batch , I just added the feature to read chunks of file and shuffle into batch to improve speed.
description_lemmatized: notebook showcase fast way read data bson generator kera idea strongly inspired httpswwwkagglecomhumananalogkerasgeneratorforreadingdirectlyfrombson since dont ssd original generator 3 per batch added feature read chunk file shuffle batch improve speed
